title: NoNameNone
author: NoNameNone
content: Hi allNeed some advice, have 150000 PZM (purchased a long time ago) paramining and forging for last month with barely any reward (2 PZM) - supposedly should be earning 0.25% a day.Could someone guide me on what i am doing wrong, is 150000 not enough?Any advice or pointers appreciatedNNN

comments.author: NoNameNone
comments.body: Anyone, or a better site to pose Prizm questions?

comments.author: hugeblack
comments.body: Most of these altcoin that claim to be decentralized will find it centralized at one point or another, especially if there is a CEO and a group of experienced developers.Therefore, do not invest in the long term, do not be deceived by what is happening around you and withdraw your profits/capital as soon as you make profits.The platform has an acceptable level of protection.
